member.summary: GET /v1.0/buckets/{name}/objects/metadata - Get object metadata. Query param: key (required).

member.summary: PUT /v1.0/buckets/{name}/objects - Create an empty object (directory marker). Query param: key (required).

member.summary: POST /v1.0/buckets/{name}/objects/upload - Upload a file. Query param: key (required).

member.name: T:AssistantHub.Server.Handlers.InferenceHandler
member.summary: Handles inference model listing and pull routes.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Handlers.InferenceHandler.GetModelsAsync(WatsonWebserver.Core.HttpContextBase)
member.summary: GET /v1.0/models - List available models on the configured inference provider. Accepts optional query parameter ?assistantId={id} to list models from an assistant's endpoint.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Handlers.InferenceHandler.PostPullModelAsync(WatsonWebserver.Core.HttpContextBase)
member.summary: POST /v1.0/models/pull - Start pulling a model in the background (admin only). Returns 202 Accepted immediately. Poll GET /v1.0/models/pull/status for progress.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Handlers.InferenceHandler.GetPullStatusAsync(WatsonWebserver.Core.HttpContextBase)
member.summary: GET /v1.0/models/pull/status - Get the current pull operation status (admin only).

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Handlers.InferenceHandler.ResolveInferenceServiceAsync(WatsonWebserver.Core.HttpContextBase)
member.summary: Resolve the inference service to use. If an assistantId query parameter is present, loads the assistant's settings and creates a temporary InferenceService targeting that assistant's endpoint. Otherwise returns the global Inference service.
member.returns: InferenceService instance, or null if an error response was sent.

member.name: M:AssistantHub.Server.Handlers.IngestionRuleHandler.PutIngestionRuleAsync(WatsonWebserver.Core.HttpContextBase)

member.summary: PUT /v1.0/ingestion-rules/{ruleId} - Update ingestion rule by ID.
